formula: a(n) = (-1)^n/2*floor(n!*exp(1)-n+1), n>0. - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Aug 17 2002E.g.f.: (2+2*x+x^2)/(2*(1+x)*exp(x)) =(1+x/(G(0))/2 ; G(k) = 1 - 1/(1 + x + x^2 - (x*(1+x))^2/(x*(1+x) - (k+1)/(1 + x/G(k+1)))) ; (continued fraction). - Sergei N. Gladkovskii, Dec 28 2011
